8e064422b84d6e9d0b03cf87070ef45e:
Dosage Plan:
Hello! For this child, I recommend administering 300-450 mg of Acetaminophen every 4-6 hours, max 5 doses a day. For Ibuprofen, give 150-300 mg every 6-8 hours. Follow doctor’s advice!

Interaction Plan:
Caution! Avoid giving alcohol and avoid giving Ibuprofen to children with stomach bleeding or hypertension. Also, avoid consuming alcohol while taking Acetaminophen due to liver risk. Consult a doctor!
